entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
